name: Data Analytics & AI in Trading
content: Effective Data & Analytics Strategy to Make Better Investments, Translating to Better Profits and Happy Clients. What to expect: Few organisations have embraced data & analytics to the extent of financial services. Effective adoption brings with the opportunity to make better investments, translating to better profits and happy clients. However, with such a complex technology, there are key challenges to overcome: How can we bridge the gap between traditional investment strategies and machine learning? What are the pros and cons of using robo-advisors for mid-level investors? How can we build up a portfolio of use cases for advanced techniques such as natural language processing? Data Analytics & AI in Trading will address these issues and more. Join us at Data Analytics & AI in Trading, where will bring together the UK and Europeâ€™s investment managers, wealth managers traders and brokers to share best practice and showcase excellence in AI and emerging technologies.
